conversations.english: Where shall I register, please?
conversations.chinese: 请问在哪儿挂号？
conversations.reply_english: Here. Do you have a registration card?
conversations.reply_chinese: 这里，你有挂号卡吗？

conversations.english: Good morning. What's the matter with you?
conversations.chinese: 早上好。你哪里不舒服？
conversations.reply_english: Good morning, doctor. I have a terrible headache.
conversations.reply_chinese: 早上好，医生。我头疼得厉害。

title: 我要做切除阑尾的手术

conversations.english: You must know you've been scheduled to have an operation the day after
conversations.chinese: 您一定知道，您的手术安排在后天。
conversations.reply_english: Yes. But I don't know the exact time.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，但是我不知道确切时间。

conversations.english: Steven, have you got better now?
conversations.chinese: 史蒂文，你好点了吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yeah, the doctor said that I can leave soon.I really miss home.
conversations.reply_chinese: 好多了，医生说我很快就可以出院了。我真想家啊。

conversations.english: What's the matter with you, Mary? You look a bit pale.
conversations.chinese: 玛丽，你怎么了？你看起来脸色有点苍白。
conversations.reply_english: I'm afraid I've got a terrible cold. What should I do?
conversations.reply_chinese: 恐怕我得了重感冒，我该怎么办？

conversations.english: Oh!!! I have a horrible toothache.
conversations.chinese: 哦，我的牙痛死了。
conversations.reply_english: I strongly urge you to change your diet.You shouldn't eat too many desserts.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我郑重地劝告您赶紧改变饮食习惯，你甜食吃得太多了。

conversations.english: You don't look too well. Maybe you should take the day off from work.
conversations.chinese: 你看起来脸色可不太好.也许你应该请一天假。
conversations.reply_english: I couldn't do that. I have an important meeting to go to today.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我不能请假。今天我有个很重要的会议要参加。

conversations.english: What's wrong with you?
conversations.chinese: 怎么了？
conversations.reply_english: I have had a low fever these days.
conversations.reply_chinese: 这些日子我一直发低烧。

title: 我需要治疗消化不良的药

conversations.english: Good afternoon. Can I help you?
conversations.chinese: 下午好，有什么可以帮您的？
conversations.reply_english: I need some remedies for an upset stomach.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我需要一些治疗消化不良的药。

conversations.english: Hello. 911. Can I help you?
conversations.chinese: 您好。这是911。我能帮您吗？
conversations.reply_english: I need the police.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我需要警察。

conversations.english: Good afternoon, sir. What can I do for you?
conversations.chinese: 先生，午安。我能为您服务吗？
conversations.reply_english: I'd like to get this prescription filled.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我要配这张处方。

conversations.english: Doctor Ruth's office, may I help you?
conversations.chinese: 鲁丝医生办公室，我可以为您服务吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I'd like to make an appointment to see the doctor. My name is Randy Horn.
conversations.reply_chinese: 好啊，我想和医生约诊。我叫蓝蒂·郝恩。

conversations.english: Well, Randy, I'd say you've got a bad case of the flu. The main thing to do is get plenty of rest and drink lots of liquids. I'll prescribe something for that throat.
conversations.chinese: 嗯，蓝蒂，你患了重感冒。你所要做的事便是多休息和多喝水。我会开些处方治你的喉咙。
conversations.reply_english: Thanks, doctor. Is there anything I can take for this headache?
conversations.reply_chinese: 谢谢医师。我能吃什么药治疗头疼呢？

conversations.english: Hi, my name is Randy Horn. I have an appointment to see the doctor at 10:30
conversations.chinese: 嗨，我是蓝蒂·郝恩。我十点半和医生约好要看病。
conversations.reply_english: If you'll please take a seat, Mr. Horn, the doctor will be ready to see you shortly.Mr. Horn? The doctor will see you now.
conversations.reply_chinese: 请坐，郝恩先生，医生会很快看您的病。郝恩先生？医生现在要看您的病了。

conversations.english: My, it looks too queer!
conversations.chinese: 哇，看起来太奇怪了！
conversations.reply_english: Yes, it is a queer drug, a tonic only available in China. Many ancient Chinese medicine journals have recorded that it can cure such ailments as night sweat, pain at loins and knees and anaemia. It has no side effect.
conversations.reply_chinese: 一点不假。它是一种奇怪的药。一种在中国才能买到的补药。古代很多中医杂志都记载着这种药专治久病不愈、夜间盗汗、腰膝疼痛和贫血症。而且它没有副作用。

conversations.english: Say, Jim, how about going for a few beers after dinner?
conversations.chinese: 嘿，吉姆，吃完晚餐之前去喝些啤酒怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: You know that is tempting but is really not good for our fitness.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你知道的，这很诱人，但是对我们的健康没有好处。

conversations.english: Hi Bill, I saw your grandma yesterday.
conversations.chinese: 嘿，比尔。我昨天看到你奶奶了。
conversations.reply_english: Oh where was that?
conversations.reply_chinese: 噢，在哪里看到？

title: 跟朋友一起锻炼更有趣

conversations.english: Going to the gym tonight,Mary?
conversations.chinese: 玛丽，今晚去健身房吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes,Sally.I want to do some sit-ups and perhaps get in a game of pingpong.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，萨利。我想做仰卧起坐，也许还打乒乓球。

conversations.english: How can I lose weight, doctor? I seem to get fatter even when I just look at food?
conversations.chinese: 医生，我要怎么样才能减肥？我就看一眼食物也能长胖。
conversations.reply_english: Well, Jim. It is a combination of how much you eat, the type of food you eat, and when you eat your meals.
conversations.reply_chinese: 额，吉姆。这关系到你吃多少，吃什么食物以及你什么吃。

conversations.english: What's wrong with you, young man?
conversations.chinese: 年轻人，你怎么了？
conversations.reply_english: Doctor, I have a bad cough and a headache.
conversations.reply_chinese: 医生，我咳嗽咳得很厉害，还头疼。

conversations.english: Come in and sit down, Jack. Now, what's the trouble?
conversations.chinese: 进来，请坐，杰克。你哪里不舒服？
conversations.reply_english: I've got a terrible pain in my stomach, Doctor.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我的肚子很疼，医生。

conversations.english: Well, good morning, Tom. I haven't seen you for a long time.
conversations.chinese: 额，早上好，汤姆。很久不见了。
conversations.reply_english: I'd been feeling pretty well until just a few days ago.
conversations.reply_chinese: 从几天前开始我觉得不舒服。

conversations.english: What's the matter with me, Doctor?I feel so tired these days.
conversations.chinese: 我怎么了，医生？我这些天觉得很累。
conversations.reply_english: It's your blood pressure, I'm afraid. It's far too high.
conversations.reply_chinese: 恐怕是你的血压太高了。

conversations.english: How is the result of your lab test?
conversations.chinese: 你的检查结果怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: When it comes to that, I have a lot to say.
conversations.reply_chinese: 说来话长了。

conversations.english: I'd like a facial.
conversations.chinese: 我想要做脸部按摩。
conversations.reply_english: Which kind would you like？ We have five different varities of facials.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你想做哪种？我们有5种不同的脸部按摩。

title: 美容保健Having the hair dyed

conversations.english: Could I have my hair dyed?
conversations.chinese: 能帮我染一下头发吗？
conversations.reply_english: Certaintly, which color do you want to dye it？
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然，你想要染成什么颜色的？

conversations.english: Hello! How are you.
conversations.chinese: 你好！怎么样。
conversations.reply_english: Not too well! I’m just to the doctor. I haven’t been feeling too well.. over the last few days.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我不舒服！我刚去看医生了。这几天一直不舒服。

conversations.english: Hey, you look great! how's everything?
conversations.chinese: 嗨,你看起来状态不错最近怎么样?
conversations.reply_english: Yeah, you know what?I've been going to the club regularly. The training really pays off. Now I am in a good shape and I know more about how to keep fit.
conversations.reply_chinese: 知道吗,最近我常去健身俱乐部.锻炼确实很有用,我现在身材不错,还学到很多保健知识.

conversations.english: Hi Benjamin. My name is Dr. Green. What seems to be the matter?
conversations.chinese: 嗨，本杰明。我是格林医生。你哪里不舒服？
conversations.reply_english: I've been feeling pretty ill for a few days now.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我觉得不舒服已经有好几天了。

conversations.english: Billy, you don’t look too well. Maybe you should take the day off school.
conversations.chinese: Billy，你看上去不舒服。也许你该请一天假。
conversations.reply_english: But Mom! Today we’re playing football! I love football!
conversations.reply_chinese: 可是妈妈！我们今天踢足球！我喜欢足球！

title: 我感冒了脖子上有疹子

conversations.english: Good morning. What seems to be the problem?
conversations.chinese: 早上好。怎么回事？
conversations.reply_english: Good morning, doctor. I feel terrible. I’ve got a cold and I have a rash here on my neck. I’m not sleeping well either. What do you think the problem could be?
conversations.reply_chinese: 早上好，医生。我感觉不舒服。我感冒了，脖子上有疹子。我还睡不好觉。你觉得是什么问题？

conversations.english: Well, what is your trouble?
conversations.chinese: 你有什么问题？
conversations.reply_english: I'm not feeling well, doctor. I have a sore throat.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我不舒服，医生。我喉咙疼。

title: 我浑身无力感觉很糟糕

conversations.english: What's wrong with you?
conversations.chinese: 你哪儿不舒服？
conversations.reply_english: I have a sore throat and headache.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我嗓子痛，头也疼.

conversations.english: Good afternoon, madam. How can I help you?
conversations.chinese: 下午好,女士.有什么能为您效劳吗?
conversations.reply_english: Well, I am a little bit out of shape. I think I should get some exercise to keep fit. what kind of service do you offer?
conversations.reply_chinese: 那个,我身体不太好,想做点运动来保持体型.你们能提供什么服务?

conversations.english: Dan, Dan， dude. You have to come over to my house right now!
conversations.chinese: 丹，丹，哥们。你必须马上到我家来。
conversations.reply_english: Is everything OK?
conversations.reply_chinese: 一切都正常吗？

conversations.english: What’s wrong with you? Why are you scratching so much?
conversations.chinese: 你怎么了？为什么一直在搔。
conversations.reply_english: I feel itchy! I can’t stand it anymore! I think I may be coming down with something. I feel lightheaded and weak.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我感到很痒，我再也无法忍受了。我想我肯定是得了某种病，我感到头昏、无力。

conversations.english: Are you okay, man? You don’t look very well.
conversations.chinese: 老兄，你没事吧？你脸色看起来很不好。
conversations.reply_english: Ugh, I feel terrible. I went out last night with Trevor, and things got a little out of hand.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我感觉糟透了。我最晚和Trevor出去了，后来事情有点失控了。

conversations.english: What seems to be the problem?
conversations.chinese: 你有什么问题？
conversations.reply_english: I have a really bad toothache! My cheek is swollen and I can’t eat anything.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我的牙很痛。我的脸肿了，我都没法吃东西了。

conversations.english: Excuse me. I need to refill this prescription.
conversations.chinese: 抱歉，我要重新加满这瓶药。
conversations.reply_english: It says on the bottle here that you can have two refills.
conversations.reply_chinese: 瓶子上写着你可以重新加满两次。

conversations.english: I need help. I think my arm is broken.
conversations.chinese: 我需要帮助，我的手臂断了。
conversations.reply_english: Alright. Have you been to this hospital before?
conversations.reply_chinese: 好的。你以前来过这家医院吗？

conversations.english: Ah! It hurts. Don't touch it.
conversations.chinese: 啊！好痛，别碰我。
conversations.reply_english: What part hurts?
conversations.reply_chinese: 哪里痛？

conversations.english: Look, Jim. That man just fell down over there.
conversations.chinese: 瞧，吉姆，那边有人摔下来了.
conversations.reply_english: We better see if he’s o.k.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我们最好去看看他是否没事。

title: 快让我看医生Just let me see a doctor

conversations.english: No. Just let me see a doctor. I'm worried about my arm.
conversations.chinese: 没有。快让我看医生，我很担心我的手臂。
conversations.reply_english: Be brave, sir. It won't be long.I will fill out the form for you. What is your name?
conversations.reply_chinese: 先生，勇敢一点，不会很久。我帮你填表格，你叫什么名字？

conversations.english: Oh!!! I have a horrible toothache.
conversations.chinese: 哦，我的牙痛死了。
conversations.reply_english: You should go to the dentist.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你该去看看牙医。

conversations.english: My wife is in labor!
conversations.chinese: 我的妻子要生小孩了。
conversations.reply_english: Here, Ma’am please get on the stretcher.
conversations.reply_chinese: 这里，女士，请到担架上来。

conversations.english: What is the matter with you?
conversations.chinese: 你怎么了?
conversations.reply_english: I've got a sore throat and my chest hurts.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我喉咙痛并且胸口也觉得不舒服

conversations.english: I ran it against that fence pole as I crashed. What do you think?Damn, it hurts!
conversations.chinese: 我骑车撞到栏杆，你说呢？该死，好痛！
conversations.reply_english: We'll have to get you to a hospital. I can ride you on the back of my bike.
conversations.reply_chinese: 要送你去医院才行，我可以骑车载你去。

conversations.english: Well, Mr. Smith. That's a nasty infection you have.
conversations.chinese: 额，史密斯先生。你受到严重的感染。
conversations.reply_english: Yes. Is there anything you can give me to get rid of it,doctor?
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的。医生，有没有什么药可以清除感染？

conversations.english: What is your temperature now?
conversations.chinese: 你现在的体温是多少呢？
conversations.reply_english: My temperature is 39 degrees centigrade.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我的体温是摄氏39度。

conversations.english: Oh, I think I broke my leg.
conversations.chinese: 噢，我想我把腿摔断了。
conversations.reply_english: Here, sir. Sit down in this wheel chair.
conversations.reply_chinese: 这里，先生。坐在这张轮椅上。

conversations.english: Ohhh, I think I broke my leg.
conversations.chinese: 哦哦哦，我好像是把腿给摔断了。
conversations.reply_english: Here, sir, sit down in this wheelchair.
conversations.reply_chinese: 坐这儿，先生，坐在轮椅上。

conversations.english: Hello, Doctor.
conversations.chinese: 你好，医生。
conversations.reply_english: Well, What seems to be the trouble, Mr. Williams?
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗯，威廉斯先生，你怎么了？

conversations.english: Hi, Mr. Smith. I’m Dr. Hawkins. Why are you here today?
conversations.chinese: 你好，史密斯先生。我是霍金斯医生。你今天怎么来了？
conversations.reply_english: I thought it would be a good idea to get a check-up.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我想做个检查还是好一些。

title: 身体检查应该每年一次

conversations.english: Hi, Mr. Smith. I'm Doctor Hawkins. Why are you here today?
conversations.chinese: 史密斯先生，你好。我是霍金斯医生。你今天来这里干嘛？
conversations.reply_english: I found it would be a good idea to get a check-up.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我觉得来做个身体检查好点。

conversations.english: What are you doing?
conversations.chinese: 你在干什么？
conversations.reply_english: Look at me. I look so old! I look as if I were thirty.
conversations.reply_chinese: 看看我，我看起来真老，好像已经30岁了。

conversations.english: Lily! Why aren't you up and ready for school?
conversations.chinese: 莉莉！怎么还不起床准备上学？
conversations.reply_english: I don't feel so good, Mom.
conversations.reply_chinese: 妈，我不舒服。

conversations.english: You two are so health-conscious!
conversations.chinese: 你们俩真的很重视健康！
conversations.reply_english: Well, we try! Here, I just made some carrot juice. Would you like a glass?
conversations.reply_chinese: 我们尽力啰！来，我刚榨了胡萝卜汁。你要来一杯吗？

conversations.english: You don't look well at all. Are you sick?
conversations.chinese: 你看起来一点儿都不好你生病了吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I don't feel well today.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的, 我今天觉得不舒服。

title: 吃点儿童感冒药就好了 Children's Tylenol

conversations.english: Mom!???
conversations.reply_english: I know, sweetie. Just open wide. Don't talk.
conversations.reply_chinese: 亲爱的，我知道。嘴张大。别说话。

conversations.english: Your English has really improved in the two months you've been here, too.
conversations.chinese: 你到这里的这两个月，英文也真的进步了很多。
conversations.reply_english: Do you have to work late at the computer company again tonight?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你今天在计算机公司又要加班吗？

conversations.english: I feel chilly and I've got a pain in my abdomen.
conversations.chinese: 我觉得发冷并且我腹部也感到痛
conversations.reply_english: How long have you had it?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你像这样有多久了?

title: 我疼得受不了了 It's unbearable

conversations.english: Ouch, it’s unbearable.
conversations.chinese: 哎呦，痛得受不了。
conversations.reply_english: Please keep calm. I know the pain isn’t what flesh and blood can stand. But be brave.
conversations.reply_chinese: 请镇静一点。我知道这不会死常人能忍耐的疼痛，但勇敢点。

conversations.english: Is this the registration office?
conversations.chinese: 这儿是挂号处吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, it is. Which department for?
conversations.reply_chinese: 是啊，你要看哪一科？

conversations.english: Excuse me, doc. I am not feeling well. Can you help me?
conversations.chinese: 对不起，医生。我有点不舒服。您能帮我吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, but not here. Have you got registered yet?
conversations.reply_chinese: 可以啊，但不是在这儿。你挂号了吗？

conversations.english: Here you are. How is Danny?
conversations.chinese: 你们在这里啊。丹丹怎么样了？
conversations.reply_english: Better now. We are just back from the hospital. We were lucky to meet a well-known doctor.
conversations.reply_chinese: 现在好多了。我们刚刚从医院回来。很幸运我们碰到了一位很好的大夫。

title: 中药的治疗效果更持久

conversations.english: Here you are. You left the medicine here.
conversations.chinese: 你回来了。你把药落在这里了。
conversations.reply_english: Sorry. I was too worried.
conversations.reply_chinese: 对不起。我刚才太担心了。

conversations.english: What can I do for you?
conversations.chinese: 有什么需要的吗？
conversations.reply_english: I need some medicine.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我需要一些药。

conversations.english: How are you feeling?
conversations.chinese: 你觉得怎样？
conversations.reply_english: Bad. My nose keeps running. And my forehead is burning.
conversations.reply_chinese: 糟透了。我一直在流鼻涕。我一直在发烧。

conversations.english: What seems to be the problem, kid?
conversations.chinese: 你有什么事吗，孩子？
conversations.reply_english: I've got a sore throat, a runny nose and a headache.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我喉咙痛，流鼻涕，头疼。
